title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 409.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 409.2 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) Except as
provided in subdivision (b) of this section or as explicitly provided for in
another section of this part, all provisions of this part shall apply to every
student loan servicer. (b) The
following sections shall not apply to a student loan servicer that services
only federal student loans: (1)
section
409.3; (2)
section
409.4; (3)
section
409.5; (4)
section
409.6; and
(5)
section
409.7. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
409.2

Adopted

New

York State Register October 16, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 42, eff. 10/16/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
